ygData.subject: RE: Re: Re: Mino horn has gained no additional properties
ygData.msgSnippet: Of course we now can use /dance.  Have you tried it?  Since my bard is female I plan on finding a couple of the new animated emotes that work as a dance and
ygData.messageBody:
Of course we now can use /dance. Have you tried it? Since my bard is
female I plan on finding a couple of the new animated emotes that work as a
dance and hotkey them.

/dance is good, but it's brief and would get pretty dull if you just did
/dance /dance /dance /dance, so I plan on doing something like /dance /point
/laugh /shiver or something. Gotta find an interesting combination and then
mix it up.

Crier Sharpsong - 28th on Fennin Ro



> -----Original Message-----
> From: flash@... [mailto:flash@...]
> Sent: Friday, October 29, 1999 12:05 PM
> To: eqbards@onelist.com
> Subject: [eqbards] Re: Re: Mino horn has gained no additional properties
>
>
> From: <flash@...>
>
> Be still thy tongue, John(tm) !!
>
> There are SOME bardettes who would give up Rodcets nice fishy
> to be able to dance!
>
> Of course, I sorta like the idea of the men being forced to dance
> for us =)
>
> Frashii, 26th 'White Mans Shuffle' Bard
> Seekers of Lore officer, Tarew Marr http://www.loreseekers.com
>
>
> > On Thu, 28 Oct 1999, Donny Dane wrote:
> > >
> > > as far as I can tell, the Mino Horns did not gain anything additional,
> even
> > > though the patch message said they did.
> >
> > Arrrggghhh! No! The humanity!
> >
> > The mino horn no longer STOPS you from doing the silly dance!
> > You dance with it just as if you were using a flute.
> > Noooooooooo!!!!
> >
> > --
